title: Fulbright Grantees From Afghanistan Visit U of A (University of Arkansas)
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) Photo by Kirk Lanier Fulbright grantees from Afghanistan gather around the statue of J. William Fulbright in the Old Main courtyard. The University of Arkansas hosted more than 60 U.S. Department of
